docs.lead_paragraph: The college student who gobbles dexedrine pills to stay awake during exam week, the overweight housewife hooked on appetite killers, the truckdriver who relies on "bennies" to keep him awake on long trips, and the East Village mainliner who shoots "speed" into his veins to achieve the highest of all highs, all have this in common:
